author: John von Neumann
summary: Von Neumann responds to van der Waerden's recommendation of Dr. Kurt Strebel for an Institute position, explaining that stipend funds for 1953-54 are largely exhausted but inquiring about availability for 1954-55. He encloses application forms and will circulate the recommendation letters to his colleagues.
title: Discussion of Stipend Funding for Dr. Strebel
